text: The 2022 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament was a single-elimination college basketball tournament. There were 68 teams in it. The tournament was for National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I men's college basketball. The winner of it was the national champion for the 2021–22 college basketball season. The tournament started on March 15, 2022. It ended on April 4. The championship game was between the Kansas Jayhawks and North Carolina Tar Heels. The Jayhawks won against the Tar Heels by three points (72–69). This was the fourth time the Jayhawks won the national championship. == References == Category:College basketball
title: 2022 NCAA Division I men's basketball tournament
